newsitem.title: USA: Motorola starts building Brazil plant.
newsitem.headline: Motorola starts building Brazil plant.

text.p: Motorola Inc said Thursday it began construction of its cellular infrastructure equipment manufacturing facility in Jaguariuna, in the state of Sao Paulo, Brazil.
The factory is the first of a multi-phased, 200-acre project planned by Motorola do Brasil. When the project is completed, it will house other business units as well, the company said.
The plant is scheduled to be completed in November and will create 200 jobs.
Motorola, based in Schaumburg, Illinois, provides wireless communications, semiconductors and advanced electronic systems, components and services.
